title: Update Our Team member name on Home page

requirements.summary: Replace the Our Team member name "Amit Patel" with "Yash Gorivale" using the shared team member data source so the Home page reflects the change without component hardcoding.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Home page "Our Team" section, the card that previously displayed the name "Amit Patel" now displays "Yash Gorivale".
No instances of the name "Amit Patel" remain in the Our Team data used by the Home page.
The change is implemented in the shared team member data source (frontend/src/config/team.ts) so the rendered OurTeamSection component reflects the updated name without hardcoding in the component.

file_operations.description: Update the relevant TeamMember entry in the exported teamMembers array by changing name from "Amit Patel" to "Yash Gorivale", leaving role/title, image, and ordering unchanged.
